review_content: The JIUMESS 20000mAh Power Bank Portable Charger is an absolute lifesaver for anyone on the go. With its massive capacity, I never have to worry about running out of battery on my phone or other devices again. The inclusion of built-in cables for easy charging means I can leave the house fully equipped without needing to carry extra cords. The USB fast charging capabilities ensure that my devices are juiced up quickly, even when I'm in a rush. Plus, its compact size makes it perfect for tossing into my bag or pocket when I'm out and about. Overall, this power bank has become an essential accessory for keeping my devices powered up wherever I am.

This power bank came fully charged and ready to go right out of the box. I especially love the attached charging cords that I can plug directly into my device without having to use my charging cable. Charge lasts a long time and it's great being able to power my devices without worrying about my proximity to an outlet.

This little item is something else! It holds a lot of power, is compact and has multiple  cables to charge different phones. I can't keep enough of these.  It has become a go-to gift idea when I want to surprise someone and for the price right now, it's unbeatable. I love this product and highly recommend it.

I can charge all of the electronics that I carry with me (work phone, personal phone, earbuds) with ONE CHARGER and without having to make sure that I have packed multiple chargers (since they all seem to require a different one). It is very compact and keeps a charge for quite some time even when charging multiple electronics, multiple times!! Very satisfied!

Loved these! Quality. Small size. Handy with all the  variety of connections. I will
Use it for charging my phone and computer but I actually got them because I got a heated vest and this was small enough to fit in the pocket of the vest and had the capacity to keep the vest running forever. While the snow and record breaking low temps were occurring, I was toasty warm.

my boys tend to fight as soon as their phones/tablets die (especially on road trips.)
this has been a godsend, and it charges their devices multiple times before needing recharged

These are the best, I purchased 2. I have charged several devices at once and still have plenty of power to charge more. I don't have to worry about the cable as this device has 4 plus an input I used on a jacket that warms up.
Before taking this battery pack on a trip, I tested it.  I was able to completely charge my cellphone for 3 straight nights. So thumbs up for convenience,  reliability, and comfort.

So this was gonna be great because it has a cord so I won't have to search for them and all our phones and our stereo will be covered well within the first week. The iPhone charging cord doesn't work. We live on a generator right now so we need to have something like this so that we're always charged just in case of emergency. I'm not happy with the product right now although it's still charging androids and a charger anything is charged charger.l so this was gonna be great because it has a cord so I won't have to search for them and all our phones and our stereo will be covered well within the first week. The iPhone charging cord doesn't work. We live on a generator right now so we need to have something like this so that we're always charged just in case of emergency. I'm not happy with the product right now although it still charging androids and anything that uses the C cord.

it took forever to get full the plug in cord is so short unless there is a table right next to the outlet and at the same height, it has to hang fron the outlet. It also drained my phone battery when i had it hooked up and forgot about it in my purse.

It uses micro USB to charge. You plug it in and nothing lights up to show if it's charging or not.  Materials are of poor quality. When you plug your device in, it charges for three seconds  and then it turns off. 
You have to plug in a second or third time for it to start charging . Definitely not worth what I paid for it. And if you want to return it you have to pay for the shipping
This charger overall is a great one. It's compact and exceptionally light with diversified functions. However, the battery itself doesn't stay charged long enough.

it is junk. Comes charged at 75%. I use that charge. Then I tried to charge it, and nothing worked, and yes, I followed the directions.  Google has no useful information on this battery bank. unbranded.
thought it was solar power. yet again, fooled by Good Ole Sam Walton. May God rest his soul.... WATCH THE HOLDING OF YOUR MONEY AS YOU'LL NEVER, EVER SEE IT AGAIN!

The 1 great feature I like about the portable charger is that the cell phone charging cables are built into it. I'm not fumbling around trying to find a cell phone charging cable to charge my phone. The device is about the size of a checkbook and the LCD screen showing the % life remaining on portable charger is bright and easy to read. I feel this was a great purchase for the price I paid!
review_title: Handy item and easy to use!

review_content: It takes quite a while for the power bank to charge up. I must say that the charge on it does not seem to last very long. I would connect the power bank (100%) to my phone at 30% charge and charge my phone up to 100%, and the power bank would be blinking low battery.

It continues to work as designed and because of the attached cables it is easier to use than other chargers where you need to have a cable to connect your device.

The digital charge level is also very helpful. It charges my phone 2 or 3 times before needing to be recharged.

Good reliable product. i scrolled through the reviews before I made my purchase and I looked at 25  reviews and 90% were positive review. This is a good product. It charges my phone and it doesn't not take long to charge up the bank. Well worth your dollars for this one.

Nice backup battery.  I used it to recharge my cell 4 or 5 times before having to recharge it. Has a nice digital readout showing power used %26 left. It's heavy, but well made, and I really like the attached %26 self-storing cables that can't be misplaced. Good unit !

I wanted a portable power bank to recharge my Android phone. Not being very"Computer Literate," I was nervous about finding a charger/power bank that would fit my LG G6 phone! I am so happy I bought this, it is wonderful! It comes complete with 4 different attached cords, so one of them fits my phone perfectly! It holds a chharge for a long time, and even after it has charged my phone, it still has between 50-75% power left! This is going to make our summer vacation so much better, I won't be searching for a plug, or have to go back to the room! Great product!

This charger works fantastic! I really really like it and now it is my go to back up charger. I love the four cord options and light weight of the product. I wish it had a % remaining versus the 25, 50, 75, 100 LED numbers. This doesn't really tell the consumer how much time is left to charge an items.

The battery feels surprisingly light (feels mostly hollow) compared to my other functional 20000nAh battery bank. After I fully charged it, I was barely able to top off 2 mostly full cell phones before the battery bank was empty.

The built-in cables appear to work fine, but that matters little if it can't store the needed power.

It takes quite a while for the power bank to charge up. I must say that the charge on it does not seem to last very long. I would connect the power bank (100%) to my phone at 30% charge and charge my phone up to 100%, and the power bank would be blinking low battery.

This portable power charger works great for my military son. The multiple ports allow him to charge his phone, earbuds and laptop all from this one charger. He can pack it with him and use it all day during classes when he can't necessarily be close to a power outlet. Other soldiers have inquired where they could get one like his because they're always trying to borrow it from him. Highly recommend this portable charger!

It continues to work as designed and because of the attached cables it is easier to use than other chargers where you need to have a cable to connect your device.

The digital charge level is also very helpful. It charges my phone 2 or 3 times before needing to be recharged.

Love the plug and play of the usbs and yes the one charges the device. Stand doesn't necessarily stand up to expectations but I'm playing Pokémon go and it keeps me charged unless the phone and battery gets too hot in the sun, power saving keeps me at 80% but it's dropped a few times as it's used for an all day event which can be 8  hours.
review_title: Great for in hand or sitting charging! Caution?!

Perfect! Second one I order. Gifted the second one to a friend. It's my backup when I leave the house. Keep it in my purse. All plugs attached and ready to go. I got this last one sale. Win win!

I've been using this power bank for about 6 days. It's now giving off a burnt smell and I don't feel it's safe to use. Unfortunately I no longer have the packaging, so I will be throwing it away.

The instructions for use, provided with the PowerBank, are TERRIBLE.   If this is any indication of what you're in for, they start out with, "Here's the instruction for your better experience".    My third grader can write better English than this.

It gets worse:  There is a digital display (25 50 75 100).   Nowhere does it explain what these numbers mean.

The power button seems to do nothing.

There is a slide-out on the back side (looks like a typical place to put batteries into a remote).  No explanation in the manual and NOTHING behind the slide-out ... still a complete mystery as to its purpose.

I like the size.  It fits in my purse well.  I am happy it is not real heavy.  I love how the cables are built in.  I charged my phone easily.  The color makes it professional looking.  I have already told my friends about it.  I think it will be with me a lot.  It price was right.  I have been wanting one for a while.

review_content: Works very well. Very long lasting battery charger. It was worth the price. I had basic ones about half the size and this in the past and they always ran out after one charge of my phone. I charged this one up and have used it four times and my percentage left is still 86%.

I got it for my dad for father’s day and he loved it. He already had one but it was not as fast and it was falling apart. This one is a little heavy and thick and long which is okay because he won’t travel too far. Has a flashlight and three ports.

This is the best bank I've ever used. It gives my phone two or three changes on a full charge. It also keeps my daughter tablet charged if her tablet has died and I plug it up, while she uses it and also charges, which I've had problems with other banks being able to do that.

i love this thing it charges fast and does not lose its charge as fast as many others... my son lost it on our trip and i bought a different one from the store and it's not even remotely the same quality... so i'll have to order another

I use delivery apps, which drain my phone's battery very quickly. I didn't want to use my car charger and affect my car's battery, so I thought I'd order this portable charger, after reading the positive reviews it has received. I am extremely happy with this charger! It keeps my phone charged, even when using for 8-10 hours a day, for 3 days straight. It is sturdy, a decent size and comes with a convenient storage bag that I usually just leave on while using. I would definitely recommend and would purchase for others, as it would make a great gift!

I'm really happy this power bank. it's small, portbale with a soft carry case, lightweight, charges itself and devices w fast charge, can charge multiple devices at once, is long lasting, and even has a very small keychain style led flashlight. All for a great price. I highly recommend this item if you're looking for a good, basic power bank.

Top rate power bank. In addition to being a great phone %26 mobile game charger, I have a usb powered, blade-less fan that ran nonstop for over a day during a power outage far exceeding my expectations.  It comes with a mesh pouch in which I  added power cords for "C" and MicroUSB. It supports fast-charge also.

Bought for my teenage daughter who is on her phone 24/7, so her battery constantly dies. This little power bank does have some weight to it, but if you want it to charge your device quickly and generate enough of a charge on its own, youll have to deal with a little weight. Lighter, smaller is convenient, but they can't deliver results.  Great quality - does the job - and big enough for my daughter to keep up with and find in her bag!  Highly recommend.

I would like to reserve my review until I have had a chance to use this product.  But so far, I am happy with my original purchase and the initial charging of it went well. I would like to reserve my review until I have had a chance to use this product but so far I am happy with my original purchase and the initial charging of it went well.

Bought this on May 30th, started using it June 5. It just died! Foer no reason it will not charge anything. It will receive a charge but will not output any charge to any device. I have tried multiple cords that work on other devices but this power bank has failed. Hopefully  INIU of Walmart will send me a replacement.
Love this product. Kept our phones charged while our electricity was out after a hurricane. Lasted 2 days and 4 phones. I was so impressed I bought my daughter one.
Charged my Iphone that was at 20% battery very quickly and it only dropped the charger's battery down to 85%!!! Worth the money for sure!!!! So far no issues.
It’s efficient and high-quality. I’ve used it to charge 3 to 5 battery packs, and unlike others that last only a month, this one has been reliable for two months since I first purchased it.
review_title: Reliable and Efficient Battery Pack Charger

review_content:
This is my first powerbank that I ever bought and let me just say that this is totally worth the money. I only charge my Pixel 8 with this and on full capacity it charges 4-5 times from 10-100.
It's got a torch as well. Charging the powerbank fully takes half a day.
In my opinion it's totally worth the money and I don't think anker is any different then this. PLUS : You get a netted cover for the brick with this.

Im impressed.  I didn't know it came with a flash light. I have an old battery about the same size that doesn't charge anywhere near as fast, doesn't charge other devices as fast, and drains quickly. You can tell you're using this battery, but it charges back up in just a few hours.

The unit was solidly built, but it was much heavier than expected. Felt like it weighed one full pound. This would make using it unpractical in some instances. The unit also charged very slowly, even when using a fast-charging cord and adaptor. In addition, the adaptor became excessively hot during charging.

I bought this because we accidentally drained our car battery charging various electronics on a four day camping trip; 2 iPhones, an iPad and a small LED lamp that we use quite a lot, especially overnight.

At 5.3 x 2.8 x 1 inch, the INUI power bank is compact enough to put in a glove compartment or stow under a seat. It's a little heavy at 3/4 lb, but I am not going to be hiking with it. 

It comes with a USB-C to USB-A cord to charge the power bank, The cord is 12 inches long. There is also a case. It's a snug fit, but you can get the INUI  power bank and cord into the case. The case provides a bit of cushion, but its mesh so its not going to protect the unit from liquids. But you want to keep a lithium battery ventilated and not overheat it.

My first test of the unit:
The INUI power bank arrived charged to 53%. I plugged it into a small 2.1 amp USB-A charger; one of those little cubes that plugs into a wall socket. It took about 4 1/2 hours to charge the power bank to 100%. When my iPhone SE 2022 was down to 20% charge, I recharged it through the USB-A output port of the power bank. The iPhone charged to 100% in 2 hours, and the power bank charge fell from 100% to 92 %. (Note that the iPhone SE 2022 is one of the smaller iPhones.) That seems pretty good given the specs on the website for charging bigger phones.

This looks promising for keeping our iPhones charged for a few days, and give us a little piece of mind that we aren't draining the car battery.

I bought it two years ago and used it for my electric heating waistcoat and last year it worked normally, but this winter it was not recharging after one use I tried all kinds of AC adapters but nothing at all.
I was in a hurry, so I used another battery to get by this winter.
I contacted the seller and they sent me a new one with a 3-year warranty.
I didn't choose this battery because of the three-year warranty, but I'm glad I did.

The battery was used with satisfaction, with fast charging and high capacity.
After a year and a half, the % of capacity did not increase when charging, and when I contacted the company about the problem, the response and response was prompt.
Furthermore, the three-year warranty was as stated and the response was quick.
I thought the support was excellent.

Weight Sluggishness with a feeling of being stuffed, no wonder it's a quirk.

That's because it stores enough electricity to power several smartphones.
In any case, I'm very satisfied with the overall rating.
It's a solid product in terms of size and the bag it came in.
Thank you.
review_title: It looks luxurious Be careful, the M1mac can't be charged!

review_content:
No complaints about capacity and charging speed.

There are a surprisingly large number of inexpensive mobile batteries that have significantly less actual measurement than the capacity as indicated, but the TORQUE5G is almost 20000mA because it fills up fully four times!
I have not measured or calculated with a device, but the speed in my experience is unquestionably fast, recovering to 80-90% in 30 minutes from about 10% remaining. 0-100% takes less than an hour.
I don't charge my laptop or tablet, so I don't know what it can do, but it's more than enough to charge a smartphone, cordless earphones, mobile fan, etc.

However, as a 'portable device' it is big and heavy! It's not an exaggeration to say that it's stressful for a woman to carry around.
Unless you're someone who travels all day using location-based apps, or uses a notebook or tablet for long periods of time in an environment without a power outlet, I'd recommend something lighter, even if it has a smaller capacity.
That's how heavy it is.

I like the fact that the remaining charge level is displayed numerically - the numerical display is a good indication of whether the device to be charged can be fully charged. I also wish it was a bit thinner and lighter, but at the moment, all manufacturers are the same - so I'm not sure.
review_title: I like that the remaining charge is displayed numerically.

review_content: I bought this for my Yamazen heater waistcoat, and considering it has 2000 amps, I don't blame the weight. It lasted 4 hours in the middle of winter when set to the highest setting. But even with the quirky 2.0A charging time, it took about 10 hours to fully charge from 25% remaining.

I bought it two years ago and used it for my electric heating waistcoat and last year it worked normally, but this winter it was not recharging after one use I tried all kinds of AC adapters but nothing at all.
I was in a hurry, so I used another battery to get by this winter.
I contacted the seller and they sent me a new one with a 3-year warranty.
I didn't choose this battery because of the three-year warranty, but I'm glad I did.

I've only used it a few times, but neither the light nor the LCD shines, and both charging and discharging have become impossible. I was surprised at how fast it became a paperweight. However, I contacted support and they immediately replaced it. The replacement is currently working without any problems.

The battery was used with satisfaction, with fast charging and high capacity.
After a year and a half, the % of capacity did not increase when charging, and when I contacted the company about the problem, the response and response was prompt.
Furthermore, the three-year warranty was as stated and the response was quick.

review_title: Very quick and reliable response to initial defects

review_content: You won't regret buying this! The last time I had a power bank was 10 years ago… let me tell you this is such an improvement from what they once were. I have an iPad and my iPhone, they both have a large battery capacity, yet somehow this can charge my phone 3 times and still get my iPad to roughly 50 percent. It charges quickly and I would recommend, especially if you hate always being connected to a wall.

So, let me tell you about this device—it's a lifesaver. At first, I wasn't sure about the whole no-cord situation, but the design? Brilliant. I can charge it up or pull power from it wherever I am, and it holds a charge for four days straight. As someone who's always on the go, this stays in my bag, ready to keep me connected.

I usually charge it overnight, and while it does take a full eight hours to go from zero to one hundred, it's worth it. I've used it to charge my MacBook Air, iPad, iPhone 15 Pro Max, and even helped out a few friends along the way. It's versatile like that.

Now, it's not exactly lightweight—it's got some heft to it. I think a protective case with rubberized edges would be a great addition. But overall, if you need reliable power on the go, this is the one.
Loved the Anker external battery! Very reliable and charged phone fully up to 4 times!

Works really good to charge your phone when the power is off. My only issue was it didn't tell you the type of charger that you need. I called the manufacturer and they advised me what I needed to purchase
Really does the job. This is my first b/u charger so I have nothing to compare it to. Seemed heavy and took 5 hrs to charge from 30% to full.
Charges devices but it takes a long time for it to charge up to 100% so you can charge other devices.

After buying, I found better chargers that are smaller, have the same capacity, have 45w charging instead of 15w, and the included cord is part of the whole assembly and not separate. Not worth the price when you can find something better from the same company.

When I plug it in to my phone with the C2C charger, the battery charge in my phone goes down. I'm going to buy a USB charger and try to plug it in that way to see if it works any better. Otherwise it's very heavy and it's hard to carry around. I wish I would have gotten the smaller one.
review_title: Heavy charging bank is less convenient

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Anker 20000mAh 15W power bank is a reliable companion for those on the go. Its substantial capacity ensures multiple device charges, making it ideal for travel or emergencies. The 15W output delivers a swift and efficient charging experience. The sleek and durable design reflects Anker's commitment to quality, while features like PowerIQ technology enhance compatibility with various devices. With this power bank, you're equipped with a portable powerhouse that combines capacity, speed, and durability – a solid choice for staying charged in any situation.
review_title: Reliable for those on the go

review_content: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I always carry a portable charger with me and this definitely lasted me the whole day, it even has some leftover. I can put this in my work bag and know that I don't have to worry about my phone dying. The only downside is that it is quite larger than I expected. I can't carry it for a night out due to it being too large however it does fit in my work bag.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I only have good things to say about this power bank. It last long, one charge could last you about 48-72hours. I have it in my work bag because I cannot have my phone die while at work and so far it's been very helpful. I wish it came with cords attached to it so I don't have to always remember to take my cord. 
The only concern I have is weight, it's not exactly lightweight and can seem like a lot to carry around. 
Other than that I absolutely love using it.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This thing has SO MUCH charging power, I keep it in my car for emergencies now, but I used it for a bit to see the capabilities and boy does it work. It's sort of large but it does fit in a sling bag (see photo). It's just super heavy, like at least a pound or two. I'd recommend it if you need something with lots of power but not if you're using it for everyday carrying.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This charger is slim, sleek, and compact, just a bit larger than my iPhone itself, it fits perfectly into my handbag. My only complaint is that it is a bit heavy, but that is to be expected in charger with this much charging capacity. I've used it for a bit over a month now, and It has worked well for me. It charges quickly and I can fully charge my phone multiple times with it before I need to recharge it. 

I often use Uber/lyft when I go out, and I feel secure in that I can always order my ride regardless of how much I use my phone.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I used this power bank for my last international trip. I liked that it's small enough to fit inside my purse without taking too much space and it display the percentage (which my previous anker power bank didn't do). I know this is a quality brand so I'm satisfied with my product.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is great for so many reason but especially for traveling. Battery last hours and stays charged when not in use. Also displays how much battery life it haves.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This portable charger works really good but it is very big and bulky. I like a portable charger to be slim and sleek for portability. The digital screen showing power percentage is a nice feature.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I like the portable charger. The only thing is it takes too long to charge and it's really bulky and heavy. As far as charging goes it's good and gets the job done also charges it really fast.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is great for so many reason but especially for traveling. Battery last hours and stays charged when not in use. Also displays how much battery life it haves.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I'm super happy with this product. It takes a while to charge the power bank itself, but it's worth it since it charges my phone when I'm out and about and unable to find an outlet!
